sentences.en: " Honesty is the best policy " was his creed in all his business dealings.
sentences.cn: “ 诚实乃上策 ” 是他做生意的信条.

sentences.en: Ben Mattes of Ubisoft shows an upcoming version of Assassin's Creed.
sentences.cn: 本育碧马茨显示了刺客的信条即将推出的版本.

sentences.en: He created the Olympic Charter, the Creed, the athlete's Oath, the opening and the closing ceremonies.
sentences.cn: 他制定了奥运会会章 、 信条和运动员誓词, 规定了开幕式和闭幕式的仪式.

sentences.en: He lived up to his adventurous creed.
sentences.cn: 他实现了他的冒险愿望.

sentences.en: Here is a message that transcends the rites of any church or creed or organized religion.
sentences.cn: 这里包含着一种信息,它胜过任何教会的仪式,任何教义,任何有组织的宗教.

sentences.en: In fact, such a Chinese creed originated from Japan.
sentences.cn: 至少在20世纪初,中国近代各个政治派别,包括中国近代贤妻良母主义的首倡者, 几乎都曾力倡女子就业.

sentences.en: It has never been weaker as a political creed .
sentences.cn: 作为一种政治信条，它从来没有像现在这样衰微过。

sentences.en: It may be found in its completest expression in the Athanasian Creed.
sentences.cn: 亚大纳西信经里可以找到有关这方面内容的最完整的表述.

sentences.en: It takes in anybody regardless of religion, colour, or creed.
sentences.cn: 任何人，不论宗教、肤色或信仰，都可以加入。

sentences.en: people of all colours and creeds
The centre is open to all, no matter what race or creed.
sentences.cn: 该中心向所有人开放，不论种族和宗教信仰如何。

sentences.en: The Rotary Foundation looks above race, creed and politics.
sentences.cn: 扶轮基金会超越种族 、 宗教信仰和政治.

sentences.en: They offended against every article of his creed.
sentences.cn: 他们触犯了他的每一条戒律.

sentences.en: This faith is the abiding creed of our fathers.
sentences.cn: 这信念是我们祖先的永久的信念.

sentences.en: This is an indispensable part of his creed.
sentences.cn: 这是他的信条中必不可少的一部分.

sentences.en: To tell of what he chanced on was against his creed.
sentences.cn: 把他适才碰见的事情声张出去又不是他的为人.

sentences.en: We are vexed by too much inconsistency and vacillation in our creed.
sentences.cn: 我们为了信条中有太多不一致和动摇的地方而感到苦恼.

trans.tran_cn: （尤指宗教）信条，教义，主义，纲领，宗派
trans.tran_en: a set of beliefs or principles
